title: I'm have paid the fee and even filled the details without any mistakes yet this website is not confirming my submission after i click the save and confirm button its just redirecting to the same website, dont even talk about the mail system its fked up. What shall I do now?? *SERIOUS POST*

comments.body: Send a mail with screenshots to PES

I did but their replies are kind of vague or by a person who doesn't even knows how this website works

1st reply: 

popups ups are unblocked in the browser settings and try again.

2nd reply: 

Kindly login in a different browser and try.

  
now there isn't any response from the past 14 hrs
